form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: LOI KHAI HU THE CUA NGUOI TY NAN XIN NHAP CANH HOA KY, 60

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/29/2023 BO TU PHAP HOA KY so DI TRU VA NHAP TIEE LOI KHAI HUU THE CUA NGUOI TY NAN XIN NHAP CANH HOA KY Ten: MOANG NAN. Phiny Tuoi: 60 UNG VIEN PHAI KHAI LA DU DIEU KIEN DE NHAP CANH VÃO NUOC MY NGOAI TRU TRUONG HOP DUOC LUAT PHAP QUY DINH KHAC, NHONG NGUOI THUOC CAC LOAI SÃO DAY KHONG DUOC VAO HOA KY: Nhung Ngoai Kieu da pham phap va bi ket an vi not trong toi ke' ca nhung toi pham thude phan vi luan ly (khong ke cac vi pham luu thong nho nhat), nhung Ngoai Kieu da than gia hoac co y dinh tham gia hoat dong mai dam; nhung Ngoai Kieu da tung hoac hien la ngúbi chu truong va chinh phu, là doan vien hoac CO lien he vd'i bat cu dang cong san hay doc tai não, KE ca cac chi nhanh hoac to chic 16 thuôc lien hê; nhung Ngoai Kieu da tung chu truong hoac giang day, bang cach td y phat bieu y kien hoac viet sach, bao, hoac gia nhap not to chilc (1) chong doi Chinh Phu hop phap, {ii) lât do' Chinh Phu bang vo 14c, (iii) bao hanh hoac sat hai cac vien chilc Chinh Phu vi chuc vi cong quyen cua ho, (iv) pha hoai bat hop phap cac tai (v) phá hoai hoac (vi) cac chu thuyet cong san the gidi, kcac viec thiet 14P chê ao doc tài chuyen chê tai Hoa Ky: phung igoai Kieu, có Y dinh tham gia cac hoat dong co hai hoac bat hop phap co tinh cach pha roi noi any nhung Ngoai Kiéu da bi ket an vi pham phap hoac vi pham luât le ve ma tuy, can sa, hoac da buon lau ma tuy, can sa; phung Ngoai Kieu lien he toi viec giup do nhung nguoi Ngoai Kieu khac nhap canh Hoa Ky bat hop phap: nhung Ngoai Kieu da xin dac mien hoac xin rut khoi khoa huah luyen hoac quan vu thuog Quan Luc Hoa Ky vi nai 1 X do Ngoai Kieu cua hp hoac da tung bi loai hoac sa thai khoi quan vy hoac cac khoa huan luyen do. Nhung Ngoai Kieu CO tri khôn cham phat trien, dien khung, hoac da tung len con dien mat hoac nhieu lan, Ngoai Kieu bi benh hoan tinh than, ham muon 18ch lac ve tink duc, hi benh than kinh, nghien ma tuy, pglien ruou, hoac mac benh truyen nhiem nguy hiem; nhung Ngoai, Kieu bi bat tuc the chat, bi benh hoac tinh trang khien khuyet CO anh huong to1 kha nang muu sinh; nhung Ngoai Kieu thuoc loai du thu du thuc, an xin chuyen nghiep hoac leu long; nhung Ngoai Kieu, da the hoac chu truong da the nhung Ngoai Kieu da by truc xuat khoi Hoa Ky trong nam qua, hoac da co lan by truc xuat khoi Hoa Ky, hoac da CO, lan bj tong khd khoi Hoa Ky voi ton phi do Chinh Phu chiu; nhung Ngoai Kieu da thu dão hoac tim cach thy dac dau chieu khan hang cach gia mao, gian trai, nhung Ngoai Kieu rdi khoi Hoa Ky hoac song 2 ngoai nubc My de tron quan dich trong thói chien hoac trong tinh trang
